cab.content: (1J 4263) Vom TWoi/, 2M Jwfy 1919-(Received 24th, 11 a.m.)1080 S. Secret, Afghanistan. Following from Roos-Keppell, dated 22nd.July: " Rumours that (corrupt group) Wakan Khan intends to (corrupt group ? attack) Chitral (corrupt, group ? by) three forces, via Mirkani, Urtzun and Bumboret next Friday with tribal lashkar, but has asked Amir to allow him to use regular troops as well. One village raid reported .from Bannu; one from Kohat. Afridi lashkar in Bazar has entirely dispersed, only small bands of bad characters remaining. 8hinwari lashkar near Darband has also disappeared. Lashkar at Hazarnao was beginning to disperse when Mullahs arrived from Kabul in a hurry to reinforce. All quiet otherwise."
